channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: KNN - Python
item.description: Introduction This report tackles a data analysis problem deriving from the Wine Classification data set published by UC Irvine Machine Learning Repository - https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/index.php Exploratory data analysis I df=pd.read_csv('wineset.csv', header=None) df.columns=(['Type', 'Alcohol', 'Malic', 'Ash', 'Alcalinity', 'Magnesium', 'Phenols', 'Flavanoids', 'Nonflavanoids', 'Proanthocyanins', 'Color', 'Hue', 'Dilution', 'Proline']) df.head() .dataframe thead tr:only-child th { text-align: right; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: left; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } Type Alcohol Malic Ash Alcalinity Magnesium Phenols Flavanoids Nonflavanoids Proanthocyanins Color Hue Dilution Proline 0 1 14.
